document_data.name: Hover
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hover''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[alteration]] and [[conjuration]] [[spell]] that allowed the caster to stop the movement of a falling, jumping, or flying creature for several minutes.
document_data.Effects: This spell only worked on a single target, so it could be used to separate a rider from their aerial mount. Any target capable of shifting into an ethereal state or to another [[plane of existence]] could escape the spell's magic.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was found within the ''[[Libram of Lathintel]]''.
